    • Method Detail

      • chooseOptimalSize

        protected static android.util.Size chooseOptimalSize(android.util.Size[] choices,
                                                     int width,
                                                     int height)
        Given choices of Sizes supported by a camera, chooses the smallest one whose width and height are at least as large as the minimum of both, or an exact match if possible.
        Parameters:
        choices - The list of sizes that the camera supports for the intended output class
        width - The minimum desired width
        height - The minimum desired height
        Returns:
        The optimal Size, or an arbitrary one if none were big enough

      • configureTransform

        private void configureTransform(int viewWidth,
                                int viewHeight)
        Configures the necessary Matrix transformation to `mTextureView`. This method should be called after the camera preview size is determined in setUpCameraOutputs and also the size of `mTextureView` is fixed.
        Parameters:
        viewWidth - The width of `mTextureView`
        viewHeight - The height of `mTextureView`
